p: The analysis of the essential oil of P. heptaphyllum resin by GC-MS/MS gave rise to the identification of 23 constituents, especially monoterpenes ( Table 1). The constituents present in great abundance in the commercial resin were limonene, eucalyptol, and p-cymene ( Figure 1), whereas in the natural resin, the main components were limonene, p-cymene, and Î±-terpineol, with a yield of 1.38% and 0.90%, respectively.
